settings.title: Why Canterbury's Tradespeople Choose Invicta Tools
settings.paragraph_1: Based right here on the Wincheap Industrial Estate, Invicta Tools Canterbury is the go-to trade counter for builders, electricians, plumbers and joiners across the city. Whether you're working on a heritage restoration in the cathedral quarter or fitting out new-builds on the Thanington development, we stock the professional power tools and consumables you need — and you can collect them on your way to site.
settings.paragraph_2: Canterbury's mix of historic buildings and modern developments demands versatile, reliable tools. From Makita's 18V LXT cordless range for on-site flexibility to DeWalt's XR platform for heavy-duty applications, we carry the full professional lineup. Our trade counter team can advise on the right kit for your specific job, whether that's second-fix carpentry or commercial fit-out.
settings.paragraph_3: We're open from 7:30am weekdays so you can grab what you need before your first fix. With over 28 years serving Kent's trade, we understand that downtime costs money — that's why we hold deep stock of batteries, blades, bits and fixings alongside the big-ticket items.

settings.title: Need Tools in Canterbury?
settings.subtitle: Call our Canterbury branch for expert advice, or shop online with free delivery over £30.
